structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Breaking And Entering Of Trucks, Tractors, Trailers Or Freight Containers
law.text: Whoever breaks and enters, or enters without breaking, a truck, tractor/trailer unit, trailer, semi-trailer or freight container with intent to commit a felony, shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for not more than ten years or by a fine of not more than five hundred dollars and imprisonment in the house of correction for not more than two years.
